name: Kedai: different ways to die
description:
This game was made in 1 week for Brackeys Game Jam 2023.1.

Story:

You are a cat who went to heaven and was fascinated by the beauty of heaven.

 However you can not enter the heaven untill you lost all your lives. 

The curse upon you prevents you from dying again the way you die.

You need to discover and find new ways to lost you remaining lives.

How To Play:

The controls are very simple. All you need to do is discover the environments and have lots of fun on the journey.

Move: A / D

Jump / Double Jump: Space

Interact: E

Meow: F
